column2: Upgrade your realm from Tribal to Feudal.
A distant relative has died and sent you an inheritance.
Force all titles to use Absolute Cognatic Primogeniture.
Convert your realm to your current religion.
Spend gold in exchange for society points.
Summon a Low-born Nobleman to Court
An unmarried low-born Nobleman arrives at Court.
Summon a Low-born Noblewoman to Court
An unmarried low-born Noblewoman arrives at Court.
A man arrives at court with skills suitable for your Council.
A woman arrives at court with skills suitable for your Council.
A man arrives at court with skills suitable to be your Spymaster.
Convert yourself and your realm to Germanic Pagan.
Convert yourself and your realm to Catholic.
